name: Factori-oh
description:
Have you ever wnated to play Factorio on a NOKIA 3310?  No?

Me neither!

But here it is anyways.

Controls:

move -> WASD

Dig -> Space

Use -> E

Check Inventory -> TAB

Zoom out -> M

Pause/Back -> Escape

Made for the  NOKIA 3310 JAM 3 (Mised the deadline)

Work in progress.
